note: I am a freelance translator gratefully surviving on social security. My main interests are Ukraine, political theory, economic theory, emergency capitalism, alternative economics, financial markets, liberation theology and social transformation.

fields.name: thephilosophicalforum.com
fields.value: Prof. Fabio Vighi from Cardiff Univ in Wales has many articles on emergency capitalism. In Central bank capitalism, one emergency  seamlessly follows another and trillions are injected to counter the new threat!

fields.name: The One-dimensional Man
fields.value: The one-dimensional society, Herbert Marcuse warns, is a society of fear.  Alienation, false needs and false consciousness also mark the West in decline in 2023!

fields.name: Escape from Freedom
fields.value: Sociologist Erich Fromm wrote that most peopole yearn to be in a larger group, live in a false freedom and deny their subject nature.

fields.name: Soren Kierkegaard on Humility
fields.value: "Without humility, there is no sense of wonder."
